document_data.name: Araband Tymin
document_data.mainbody: '''Araband Tymin''' was a commander in [[Chondath]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Araband was the commander of the military forces of the city of [[Timindar]], which was ruled by his father, [[Reland Tymin]]. Usually he spent most of his time drinking with friends. He usually talked with all strangers about faraway lands.
document_data.History:
In 1358 DR, at the [[Black Eye]] inn, Araband got totally drunk and argued with the [[Gray Doom]] mercenaries leader [[Olway Lezard]].

Later, he became involved in the [[Battle of Thurgabanteth]].
document_data.Personality: Despite looking irresponsible, in times of need Araband was a capable leader. He dreamed of becoming an adventurer but never left home. Normally Araband disliked metal armor and never used the emblem of his station.
document_data.Relationship: Araband was the best friend of [[Zerbin Gethrik]], the local cleric of [[Tempus]].
